title: Tanzel Smart
text:
Tanzel Etric Smart Jr. (born November 6, 1994) is an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="defensive%20tackle">defensive tackle</a> for the <a href="New%20York%20Jets">New York Jets</a> of the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a> (NFL). He played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> at <a href="Tulane%20Green%20Wave%20football">Tulane</a>, and was drafted by the <a href="Los%20Angeles%20Rams">Los Angeles Rams</a> in the sixth round of the <a href="2017%20NFL%20Draft">2017 NFL Draft</a>.
College career.
Smart attended and played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> for <a href="Tulane%20University">Tulane University</a> in <a href="New%20Orleans%2C%20Louisiana">New Orleans, Louisiana</a>.
Professional career.
Los Angeles Rams.
Smart was drafted in the sixth round with the 189th overall pick by the <a href="Los%20Angeles%20Rams">Los Angeles Rams</a> in the <a href="2017%20NFL%20Draft">2017 NFL Draft</a>.
On May 15, 2020, Smart was released by the Rams.
Buffalo Bills.
On August 16, 2020, Smart signed with the <a href="Buffalo%20Bills">Buffalo Bills</a>. He was waived on September 5, 2020.
Cleveland Browns.
On September 11, 2020, Smart was signed to the <a href="Cleveland%20Browns">Cleveland Browns</a> practice squad. He was released by the Browns on September 22, 2020.
New York Jets.
On October 14, 2020, Smart was signed to the <a href="New%20York%20Jets">New York Jets</a>' practice squad. He was elevated to the active roster on November 9 and December 19 for the team's weeks 9 and 15 games against the <a href="New%20England%20Patriots">New England Patriots</a> and <a href="Los%20Angeles%20Rams">Los Angeles Rams</a>, and reverted to the practice squad after each game. He was promoted to the active roster on January 2, 2021.
On August 31, 2021, Smart was waived by the Jets and re-signed to the practice squad the next day. He signed a reserve/future contract with the Jets on January 10, 2022.
